description: This file defines FastAPI route handlers for inference operations in a claim verification system. It includes endpoints for running full inference processes and streaming incremental inference results, utilizing various internal services for text sentencization, claim detection, evidence search, and scoring.

methods.name: InferenceResponse run_inference( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to '/run' endpoint, performing full inference pipeline including sentence splitting, claim detection, evidence search, scoring, and assembling the response.

methods.name: stream_inference( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to '/stream' endpoint, streaming incremental inference process results such as detected sentences, evidence, and scores as NDJSON.
